history.proof: intros A r f x n Hr Hinc. induction n. -- simpl. apply incr_single. -- simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: incr_concat. ++ qsimpl time: 1 use: incr_concat. qsimpl time: 1 use: incr_concat. sauto q: on dep: on depth: 3. ++ apply incr_concat. ** sauto q: on dep: on depth: 3. ** sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros A r f x n Hr Hinc.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat Hr : r x (f x) Hinc : increasing_app A r f IHn : prechain_incr A r (iteres A f x n) Unable to unify "prechain_incr ?M1858 ?M1860 (concat ?M1858 ?M1861 ?M1859)" with "prechain_incr A r match iteres A f x n with | @single _ y => concat A (single A y) (f y) | @concat _ z y => concat A (concat A z y) (f y) end".

ctx: intros A r f x n Hr Hinc.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x) A : Set r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat Hr : r x (f x) Hinc : increasing_app A r f m : Map A Heqp : iteres A f x n = single A m Unable to unify "increasing_app A r f" with "prechain_incr A r (concat A (single A m) (f m))".

ctx: intros A r f x n Hr Hinc.
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x) A : Set r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat Hr : r x (f x) Hinc : increasing_app A r f m : Map A Heqp : iteres A f x n = single A m Unable to unify "r x (f x)" with "prechain_incr A r (concat A (single A m) (f m))".

ctx: intros A r f x n Hr Hinc.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.

ctx: intros A r f x n Hr Hinc.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHn was not found in the current environment.

original: intros A r f x n Hr Hinc. induction n. -- simpl. apply incr_single. -- simpl. apply incr_concat. ++ apply Hinc. apply Hr. ++ apply IHn.
